title: Identify Crime Pattern Using Predictive Analytics
description: An analyst uses the system to find a pattern in a series of recent commercial burglaries.

tasks.description: Filter all crime reports from the last 30 days for the type 'commercial burglary'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves a list of the relevant crime reports.

tasks.description: Plot the locations and times of the burglaries on a map.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent visualizes the data geographically and temporally.

tasks.description: The system's pattern detection algorithm identifies that all burglaries occurred on Tuesday nights between 1 AM and 3 AM in a specific industrial park.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully identifies a clear crime pattern.

tasks.description: Create a bulletin for the police department detailing the identified pattern.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent communicates the intelligence to patrol officers.
